entities.name: silver cats
entities.description: Three silver cats with spectacle markings around their eyes appeared.

entities.name: patronuses
entities.description: The Patronuses ran sleekly ahead, ﬁlling the spiral staircase with silvery light.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall hurried back down the stairs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry jogged behind Professor McGonagall under the Cloak.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna jogged behind Harry and Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: Harry felt in the pouch around his neck for the Marauder’s Map.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: Harry and Luna jogged behind Professor McGonagall under the Cloak.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: The Sacking of Severus Snape is mentioned in the text.

relationships.description: The Patronuses ran sleekly ahead, ﬁlling the spiral staircase with silvery light, as Professor McGonagall hurried back down.
Harry jogged behind Professor McGonagall under the Cloak.
Luna jogged behind Harry and Professor McGonagall.
Harry felt in the pouch around his neck for the Marauder’s Map.
She halted, raised her wand ready to duel, and said, “Who’s there?”
